import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Card from '../../../../components/common/layout/Card'; import OrgChart from './orgchart/OrgChart'; import { PencilIcon, CheckIcon } from '@heroicons/react/20/solid'; const CompanyDetails = () => { const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false); const [companyInfo, setCompanyInfo] = useState({ name: 'Acme Corp Ltd', companyNumber: '12345678', incorporationDate: '2024-01-15', registeredOffice: '123 Business Street, London, SW1A 1AA', website: 'www.acmecorp.com', contactEmail: 'hello@acmecorp.com', vatNumber: 'GB123456789', bankProvider: 'Barclays Bank', bankAccountOpened: '2024-01-20' }); const [editForm, setEditForm] = useState(companyInfo); const handleSave = () => { setCompanyInfo(editForm); setIsEditing(false); }; const handleCancel = () => { setEditForm(companyInfo); setIsEditing(false); }; const handleInputChange = (field, value) => { setEditForm(prev => ({ ...prev, [field]: value })); }; return (

Company Information

{isEditing ? (
handleInputChange('name', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />
handleInputChange('companyNumber', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />
handleInputChange('incorporationDate', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />
handleInputChange('website', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />
handleInputChange('contactEmail', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />
handleInputChange('vatNumber', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />
